p: GC-grade n-hexane (>99%) was purchased from Sigma Aldrich (St. Louis, MO, USA). The reference standards of α-pinene, β-pinene, camphene, sabinene, α-thujone, β-myrcene, p-cymene, limonene, γ-terpinene, α-terpineol, terpinolene, trans-pinocarveol, terpinen-4-ol, verbenone, β-elemene, carveol, bornyl acetate, caryophyllene oxide, viridiflorol, α-bisabolol, and myrtenal were also purchased from Sigma-Aldrich.
